title: Real-time Accident Detection
description: A computer vision system that detects accidents in real-time using standard cameras, enhancing public safety and emergency response times.

title: Sales-Generating AI Chatbot
description: A custom AI chatbot that generates sales by understanding user behavior and engaging in persuasive, context-aware conversations.

title: Custom Image Generator for Marketing
description: An AI-powered tool designed for marketing teams to generate on-brand, custom images for campaigns, social media, and advertisements instantly.

title: AI CV Maker & HR Consultancy
description: An intelligent platform that helps users create professional, optimized CVs and provides AI-driven HR consultancy features for job seekers.

title: Speaking and Copying Avatar (TTS)
description: A cutting-edge Text-to-Speech (TTS) avatar that can vocalize any provided text and realistically mimic different voice styles for dynamic applications.
